page.title: 19Spurs Ground - Cheshunt
page.content: Spurs Training Ground is near Brookfield Lane.It was built 47 years ago.The groundsman has been working there for 35 years. The training ground is 11 acres in all.There are three pitches.They measure 106m by 74m,111m by 74m and 109m by 74m.The facilities have improved in recent times.They will probably be moving the training ground to Wormley because the rates are too high. It has very few open days.The last one was 2 years ago.The junior team plays there every Saturday in the season, but the stand only holds 40 people.
